channel.title: Comments on: Mr. I Like to Type, This /Ignore is for You

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description:
It used to be that the intelligence of /1 was proportional to the distance from the n00b zones. Unfortunately now the game has been out long enough to make that less of a truism.
At least on the PvP servers, the Chatty Cathies usually get ganked while they're typing :)
item.content:encoded:
It used to be that the intelligence of /1 was proportional to the distance from the n00b zones. Unfortunately now the game has been out long enough to make that less of a truism.

At least on the PvP servers, the Chatty Cathies usually get ganked while they’re typing ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.description: Somebody might say something interesting or informative in Genl. I've actually witnessed such a thing. Couple of times, even. :)
item.content:encoded: Somebody might say something interesting or informative in Genl. I’ve actually witnessed such a thing. Couple of times, even. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Chef
item.dc:creator: Chef
item.description:
You do know you can leave gen chat right?
Your ingore list is for people pestering you with PMs
People who are hyper sensitive about thier ignore list are as annoying as those spamming gen chat with nonsense
item.content:encoded:
You do know you can leave gen chat right?

Your ingore list is for people pestering you with PMs

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: It's worse when this shit happens in guild chat. Enough of it = /gquit
item.content:encoded: It’s worse when this shit happens in guild chat. Enough of it = /gquit
